loadingImages: Loading images, please wait some images will take a few seconds to complete the download process.
isSaved: The image information has been saved, you can close the window now.
notFoundError: The document was not found with the given identifier, or you don't have rights to access it.
failedToFetch: Failed to connect. Please verify that you are connected to the internet or try accessing the image again.
noImagesFound: This document does not contain images. Only images are supported on this tool.
expiredSession: Your session has expired, please access the image again to renew the session.
